name: copilot-money-mcp
description: AI-powered personal finance queries using local Copilot Money data. Query transactions, analyze spending, and track accounts with natural language.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Get transactions with optional filters for date ranges, category, merchant, account, amount, pending status, and region/country

tools.name: search_transactions
tools.description: Free-text search of transactions by merchant name with date filtering support

tools.name: get_accounts
tools.description: Get all accounts with balances, optionally filter by account type (checking, savings, credit, investment)

tools.name: get_spending_by_category
tools.description: Get spending aggregated by category for a date range with human-readable names, sorted by amount

tools.name: get_account_balance
tools.description: Get balance and details for a specific account by ID

tools.name: get_categories
tools.description: Get all categories found in transactions with human-readable names, transaction counts, and total amounts

tools.name: get_recurring_transactions
tools.description: Identify recurring/subscription charges with frequency, monthly cost, confidence score, and next expected charge date

tools.name: get_income
tools.description: Get income transactions (deposits, paychecks, refunds) with total income and breakdown by source

tools.name: get_spending_by_merchant
tools.description: Get spending aggregated by merchant name with transaction counts and averages

tools.name: compare_periods
tools.description: Compare spending and income between two time periods with totals, percentage changes, and category-by-category comparison

tools.name: get_foreign_transactions
tools.description: Get international transactions with foreign currencies or FX fees, with breakdown by country and total FX fees

tools.name: get_refunds
tools.description: Get refund/return transactions with breakdown by merchant and total refunded

tools.name: get_duplicate_transactions
tools.description: Detect potential duplicate transactions with same merchant, amount, and date

tools.name: get_credits
tools.description: Get statement credits (Amex credits, cashback, rewards) with breakdown by credit type

tools.name: get_spending_by_day_of_week
tools.description: Get spending patterns aggregated by day of week (Sunday-Saturday) with totals, averages, and percentages

tools.name: get_trips
tools.description: Detect and group transactions into trips with location, duration, total spent, and category breakdown

tools.name: get_transaction_by_id
tools.description: Get a single transaction by its ID with detailed information

tools.name: get_top_merchants
tools.description: Get top merchants by spending with rankings, transaction counts, averages, and date ranges

tools.name: get_unusual_transactions
tools.description: Detect unusual/anomalous transactions significantly above average for merchant or category

tools.name: export_transactions
tools.description: Export transactions to CSV or JSON format for external analysis

tools.name: get_hsa_fsa_eligible
tools.description: Find HSA/FSA eligible healthcare transactions at pharmacies, medical providers, dental, and vision

tools.name: get_spending_rate
tools.description: Get spending velocity analysis with daily/weekly burn rate, month-end projections, and period comparison

tools.name: get_data_quality_report
tools.description: Generate comprehensive data quality report to identify issues like unresolved categories, currency conversion problems, duplicate accounts, and suspicious categorizations
